resources.string: Enter the text you want to hear
Welcome to the Vip Assistant Demo Application!
In order to test Voice Inputting Module press mic button and then speak, your speech will be translated into text automatically!

In order to test Voice Outputting Module enter the text that you want to hear to below and set voice pitch & speed. Then you are all set! Just press GO. Your text will be translated into speech automatically!
In order to test BLE Scanner Module press \'Start Scan\' button, then recognized nearby BLE devices will be listed automatically!
